#### [Malaysian-Japan International Institute of Technology (MJIIT)](http://mjiit.utm.my/)

Premier Institution in providing Japanese-style engineering education blended with Malaysia distinctiveness for sustainable industry and society

[![](https://kl.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/residenceimg.png)](http://www.utm.my/campuslife/housing/)

#### [Residensi UTM Kuala Lumpur](http://www.utm.my/campuslife/housing/)

Perfectly located in the heart of Kuala Lumpur city. The residence at UTMKL welcomes you with warm hospitality and service, steeped in and experience the prowess
